vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Midianites living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.4;
son of: Midian (H4080);
brother of: Epher (H6081), Hanoch (H2585I), Abida (H0028) and Eldaah (H0420)
§ Ephah = "gloomy"
n pr m
1) a son of Midian
2) a Judaite, son of Jahdai
n pr f
3) a concubine of Caleb in the line of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (1)   oscuridad; (2a)   hijo de Madián, hijo de Queturá, esposa de Abraham; (2b)   concubina de Caleb; (2c)   descendiente de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以法 这个字在原文的意思是 "沮喪的"
種族名稱
1) 米甸的後代
陽性專有名詞 人名
1) 猶大人, 雅代的兒子
陰性專有名詞
3) 迦勒的妾
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以法 这个字在原文的意思是 "沮丧的"
种族名称
1) 米甸的后代
阳性专有名词 人名
1) 犹大人, 雅代的儿子
阴性专有名词
3) 迦勒的妾

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A womanof the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.46; married to Caleb (H3612H);
mother of: Haran (H2771B), Moza (H4162), Gazez (H1495)
§ Ephah = "gloomy"
n pr m
1) a son of Midian
2) a Judaite, son of Jahdai
n pr f
3) a concubine of Caleb in the line of Judah

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.47;
son of Caleb (H3612H) and Jahdai (H3056);
brother of: Regem (H7276), Jotham (H3147I), Geshan (H1529), Pelet (H6404) and Shaaph (H8174)
§ Ephah = "gloomy"
n pr m
1) a son of Midian
2) a Judaite, son of Jahdai
n pr f
3) a concubine of Caleb in the line of Judah

§ Ephah = "gloomy"
n pr m

1) a son of Midian
